p1.connecting: Connecting to P1 Wifi Gateway on port __port__
p1.connected_to_http_server: Seem to be connected to a HTTP server on port __port__. Make sure you configure the P1 relay port and not the webserver port.

p1.description:
Make sure you see a P1 datagram when you visit http://__esp-ip__:<portnumber> before adding the P1 device to Homey.
Visit the folowing websites for more information:
p1.title: Configure new P1 Meter

sensor.title: Configure device
sensor.selectCapability: Select Homey device capability for value '__name__':
sensor.noControllerSelected: You need to select a controller
sensor.selectController: You have this device enabled for multiple controllers. Select Homey:
sensor.noController: You don't have a controller enabled for this device. Enable the Homey controller and set a unique IDX in the ESP Easy device settings. If you haven't set-up Homey as a controller yet, add the Unit to Homey first. The pairing wizard wil walk you through setting up a controller
sensor.idx0: Using device IDX 0 is not supported. Change it in the ESP Easy device settings page.
sensor.duplicate: Using a duplicate device IDX is not supported. Please make sure the IDX of your devices are unique per controller. You can find and change these values on the ESP Easy device settings page.

unit.connect_description: Enter the network information of your ESP Easy unit
unit.select_description: Or select your unit from the list below:
unit.dhcpWarning: No static IP detected for this unit! Consider configuring a static IP address.
unit.controller_login:
Configure a new controller in ESP Easy at __url__.
Note: The default credentials are admin/configesp
unit.tip: You might not have any devices connected to ESP Easy yet so Homey will not get any events. You can add a 'System Info' device to test the connection or just click Next to finish setup.
unit.finish: Events received! Click next to finish setup

gpio.pin_warning: Pin is configured as __mode__, which will be overridden when you add this device!
gpio.pin_mode_default: Your unit has no configuration for this pin yet

error.unit: You need to select a unit
error.pin: You need to select a GPIO pin
error.pulseDuration: You need to enter a valid default pulse duration
error.toneDuration: You need to enter a valid default tone duration
error.toneFrequency: You need to enter a valid default tone frequency

sensor.task_not_found: Controller __controller__ does not contain a device with IDX __idx__
sensor.invalid_task: Invalid device type of "__type__" for controller __controller__, IDX __idx__
sensor.duplicate_idx: Controller __controller__ has multiple devices with IDX __idx__
sensor.io_board_offline: I/O Expander board seems to be offline
